name: Oh Baby Kart
description:
Oh Baby! It's time for racing!

Welcome to OH BABY! KART, racing like you have never seen before! Innovative drift boost and ultimate abilities! Select your driver, customize your kart and get ready to race!

Drifting Ultimate Abilities

Drifting gives you powers, ULTIMATE powers! Speed boost? Rockets? Freezing bams and booms? Pick your style and play!

Collect them all? Collect them all!

Whales, Butters and fast cars! There's karts for everyone! Decorate them with ornaments to show off your achivements or plain "whaat?", we got chopsticks, umbrellas or even pets for those long rides! The possibilities are endless!

INTENSE MULTIPLAYER ACTION

Go against competitors all over the world! Party up or go solo and get that position on the global leaderboards! More into fun play? Setup a custom lobby with your friends! You can show your mastery of the tracks or how you use your ultimates everywhere!

ADVENTURE MODE

We got more! Go on the adventure maps! A fusion of skill-based trails, daring obstacle courses and unique competitive scenarios you can put your skills to the test!



Oh Baby!
